name: solid-rock

effect.black_white: This Pokémon takes 0.75× as much damage from moves that are super effective against it. This ability functions identically to filter.
effect.black_2_white_2: This Pokémon takes 0.75× as much damage from moves that are super effective against it. This ability functions identically to filter.

short_effect: Decreases damage taken from super-effective moves by 1/4.
